feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or freezing drizzle at times mixed with ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023
